message: I propose a more equitable split, slightly favoring me due to the risk I took in declining your initial offer.  This ensures a fair outcome considering the potential for future losses from inflation.
Time is of the essence, Alice! This offer is a good compromise to ensure we both benefit before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Getting closer, but I still want a bit more
Let's end this negotiation with a fair and equal split. We are running out of time, and this ensures we both walk away with a respectable sum.
